translation.your_buddy_closed_the_private_connection: Your buddy closed the private connection.
translation.you_have_only_a_subscription_in_one_way: You only have a one-way subscription.
translation.your_message_wasnt_send_please_end_your_: Your message was not sent. Please end your private conversation.
translation.your_message_wasnt_send_because_you_have: Your message was not sent because you have no valid subscription.
translation.your_buddy_closed_the_private_conversati: Your buddy closed the private conversation! You should do the same.
translation.your_buddy_is_attempting_to_determine_: You buddy is attempting to determine if he or she is really talking to you.
translation.enter_the_answer_and_click_answer: enter the answer and click Answer.
translation.Creating_your_private_key_: Creating your private key; this may take a while.
translation.Authenticating_a_buddy_helps_: Authenticating a buddy helps ensure that the person you are talking to is really the one he or she claims to be.
translation.How_do_you_want_to_authenticate_your_bud: How do you want to authenticate {{bid_name}} ({{bid_jid}})?
translation.Question: Question
translation.To_verify_the_fingerprint_: To verify the fingerprint, contact your buddy via some other trustworthy channel, such as the telephone.
translation.To_authenticate_using_a_question_: To authenticate using a question, pick a question whose answer is known only you and your buddy.
translation.To_authenticate_pick_a_secret_: To authenticate, pick a secret known only to you and your buddy.
translation.Type_in_the_full_username_: Type in the full username and an optional alias.
translation.You_are_about_to_remove_: You are about to remove {{bid_name}} ({{bid_jid}}) from your buddy list. All related chats will be closed.
translation.Sorry_we_cant_authentikate_: Authentication failed with the chat server. Maybe the password is wrong?
translation.Should_we_notify_you_: Should we notify you about new messages in the future?
translation.Please_accept_: Please click the "Allow" button at the top.
translation.Not_one_of_our_latest_keys: Not one of our latest keys.
translation.TITLE: Job title
translation.A_fingerprint_: A fingerprint is used to make sure that the person you are talking to is who he or she is saying.
translation.Your_roster_is_empty_add_a: Your roster is empty, add a
translation.Sorry_your_buddy_doesnt_provide_any_info: Sorry, your buddy does not provide any information.
translation.Do_you_want_to_display_them: Do you want to display them?
translation.You_received_a_message_from_an_unknown_s: You received a message from an unknown sender
translation.Please_allow_access_to_microphone_and_ca: Please click the "Allow" button at the top, to allow access to microphone and camera.
translation.Do_you_want_to_accept_the_call_from: Do you want to accept the call from
translation.Video_call_not_possible: Video call not possible. Your buddy does not support video calls.

muc_hidden.description: can not be found through search

muc_membersonly.description: you need to be on the member list

muc_moderated.description: only persons with "voice" are allowed to send messages

muc_nonanonymous.description: your jabber id is exposed to all other occupants

muc_passwordprotected.description: you need to provide the correct password

muc_persistent.description: will not be destroyed if the last occupant left

muc_semianonymous.description: your jabber id is only exposed to room admins

muc_temporary.description: will be destroyed if the last occupant left

muc_unmoderated.description: everyone is allowed to send messages

muc_unsecured.description: you need no password to enter

translation.Could_load_only: Could load only __count__ rooms for autocomplete
translation.muc_explanation: Please enter room name and optional a nickname and password to join a chat
translation.Room_not_found_: A new room will be created
translation.muc_removed_kicked: You have been kicked from the room
translation.muc_removed_info_kicked: __nickname__ has been kicked from the room
translation.muc_removed_banned: You have been banned from the room
translation.muc_removed_info_banned: __nickname__ has been banned from the room
translation.muc_removed_affiliation: You have been removed from the room, because of an affiliation change
translation.muc_removed_info_affiliation: __nickname__ has been removed from the room, because of an affiliation change
translation.muc_removed_membersonly: You have been removed from the room, because the room has been changed to members-only and you are no member
translation.muc_removed_info_membersonly: __nickname__ has been removed from the room, because the room has been changed to members-only and you are no member
translation.muc_removed_shutdown: You have been removed from the room, because the MUC service is being shut down
translation.message_not_send: Your message was not send because of an error
translation.message_not_send_item-not-found: Your message was not send because this room does not exist
translation.message_not_send_forbidden: Your message was not send because you have no voice in this room
translation.message_not_send_not-acceptable: Your message was not send because you are no occupant of this room
translation.You_are_not_on_the_member_list: You are not on the member list
translation.You_are_banned_from_this_room: You are banned from this room
translation.Your_desired_nickname_: Your desired nickname is already in use. Please choose another
translation.The_maximum_number_: The maximum number of user is reached in this room
translation.You_are_not_allowed_to_create_: You are not allowed to create a room
